answers.answer: I think it's water retention. I get it every night and there's nothing you can really do to ease that. /:

Try cutting back on salt. It is proably water retention as the previous poster said. Too much salt usually is to blame. I went up three pounds last week due to to much salt lol. It is all water weight.

question: Just wondering because my hands randomly swell up in a matter of seconds. Its not preeclampsia because I've been checked for that multiple times, my hands just randomly swelled up a couple minutes ago and I'm curious why. I'll be traveling five hours tomorrow and I'm nervous about it.
title: what causes swollen hands?
